Class ModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.ModifyCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
modify customer controller handles the modify customer view for modifying customers

    • modifyCustomerSave

      public void modifyCustomerSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      The modify save first sets the current time in UTC time and then sets the text fields. Validation is then performed and the division id is set as an integer so it can be set in the SQL db properly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException
      SQLException

    • setDivisionComboBox

      private void setDivisionComboBox(int Country_ID)
      The division combo box is set when this method is called, which is each time a new country is selected in the country combo box.
      Parameters:
      Country_ID -

    • modifyCustomerCountryCombo

      public void modifyCustomerCountryCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method sets the country value when a country is selected in the combo box. It also calls the set Division Combo Box method to update the div combo box based on the currently selected country.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • customerFieldTypeValidation

      public boolean customerFieldTypeValidation(String customerName, String customerAddress, String customerPostal, String customerPhone)
      This validation method checks each text field value and displays an error alert if validation fails. It also returns a boolean value if the validation passes or fails.
      Parameters:
